trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Thoughtworks Mingle | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Thoughtworks Mingle | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Thoughtworks Mingle with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Thoughtworks Mingle with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Thoughtworks Mingle.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Thoughtworks Mingle.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A Thoughtworks Mingle tenant
trans-unit.target: A Thoughtworks Mingle tenant

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Thoughtworks Mingle
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Thoughtworks Mingle

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Thoughtworks Mingle.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Thoughtworks Mingle.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>

trans-unit.source: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Applications</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Applications</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Add at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click Add at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add application</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add application</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.
trans-unit.target: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the search box, type thoughtworks mingle.
trans-unit.target: In the search box, type thoughtworks mingle.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Application Gallery</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Application Gallery</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select Thoughtworks Mingle, and then click Complete to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select Thoughtworks Mingle, and then click Complete to add the application.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Thoughtworks Mingle</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Thoughtworks Mingle</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Thoughtworks Mingle with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Thoughtworks Mingle with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: As part of this procedure, you are required to upload a certificate to Thoughtworks Mingle.
trans-unit.target: As part of this procedure, you are required to upload a certificate to Thoughtworks Mingle.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the Thoughtworks Mingle **application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the Thoughtworks Mingle **application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the How would you like users to sign on to Thoughtworks Mingle page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the How would you like users to sign on to Thoughtworks Mingle page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure App URL page, in the Thoughtworks Mingle Tenant URL textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "http://company.mingle.thoughtworks.com", and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the Configure App URL page, in the Thoughtworks Mingle Tenant URL textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "http://company.mingle.thoughtworks.com", and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure App URL</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure App URL</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure single sign-on at Thoughtworks Mingle page, click Download metadata, and then save it on your computer.
trans-unit.target: On the Configure single sign-on at Thoughtworks Mingle page, click Download metadata, and then save it on your computer.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Log in to your Thoughtworks Mingle company site as administrator.
trans-unit.target: Log in to your Thoughtworks Mingle company site as administrator.

trans-unit.source: Click the Admin tab, and then, click SSO Config.
trans-unit.target: Click the Admin tab, and then, click SSO Config.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>SSO Config</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>SSO Config</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the SSO Config section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the SSO Config section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>SSO Config</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>SSO Config</linkText>

trans-unit.source: To upload the metadata file, click Choose file.
trans-unit.target: To upload the metadata file, click Choose file.

trans-unit.source: Click Save Changes.
trans-unit.target: Click Save Changes.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>

trans-unit.source: For AAD users to be able to sign in, they must be provisioned to the Thoughtworks Mingle application using their Azure Active Directory user names.
trans-unit.target: For AAD users to be able to sign in, they must be provisioned to the Thoughtworks Mingle application using their Azure Active Directory user names.

trans-unit.source: In the case of Thoughtworks Mingle, provisioning is a manual task.
trans-unit.target: In the case of Thoughtworks Mingle, provisioning is a manual task.

trans-unit.source: Log in to your Thoughtworks Mingle company site as administrator.
trans-unit.target: Log in to your Thoughtworks Mingle company site as administrator.

trans-unit.source: Click Profile.
trans-unit.target: Click Profile.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Your First Project</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Your First Project</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click the Admin tab, and then click Users.
trans-unit.target: Click the Admin tab, and then click Users.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click New User.
trans-unit.target: Click New User.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>New User</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>New User</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the New User dialog page, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the New User dialog page, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>New User</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>New User</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Type the Sign-in name, Display name, Choose password, Confirm password of a valid AAD account you want to provision into the related textboxes.
trans-unit.target: Type the Sign-in name, Display name, Choose password, Confirm password of a valid AAD account you want to provision into the related textboxes.

trans-unit.source: As User type, select Full user.
trans-unit.target: As User type, select Full user.

trans-unit.source: Click Create This Profile.
trans-unit.target: Click Create This Profile.

trans-unit.source: You can use any other Thoughtworks Mingle user account creation tools or APIs provided by Thoughtworks Mingle to provision AAD user accounts.
trans-unit.target: You can use any other Thoughtworks Mingle user account creation tools or APIs provided by Thoughtworks Mingle to provision AAD user accounts.

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the Thoughtworks Mingle application integration page, click Assign users.
trans-unit.target: On the Thoughtworks Mingle application integration page, click Assign users.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Assign Users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Assign Users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Yes</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Yes</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
